thread.title: Watch: ‘Guddu Ki Gun’ title track out
thread.title_full: Watch: ‘Guddu Ki Gun’ title track out - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Watch: ‘Guddu Ki Gun’ title track out
text:
The title song of Guddu Ki Gun has been released. The song features Kunal Kemmu, Aparna Sharma and Sumit Vyas.
Sung by Vikram Singh, 'Guddu ki gun...' is a party number with Kunal Kemmu dancing for 'Kayamat ka fun...'.
Directed by Shantanu and Sheershak, the film is set to release on October 30, 2015.
WATCH: Guddu Ki Gun title song
